name: Ghoul Groove
description:
One day while chilling with the boys, you were suddenly possessed by a powerful ghost. A ghost who lived and died with the power of music, and now his spirit has taken control, and is forcing you to shoot in time with the beat!

Ghoul Groove is an action/puzzle game where you have to avoid killing any friendly bystanders while your gun is out your of control, and make it through to the end! Will you come away with all boys spared?

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • R - Restart

The team

  • Serponge - Programming, Lead level designer
  • Vermillion - Lead programmer, Level design
  • TheDevon - Music, SFX
  • Hyenaedon - Art, Level design, SFX
  • Lumpy - Art, Level design, SFX
  • Thomartin - Art
